intro: Afraegle asso, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its vibrant, showy flowers that come in a variety of colors. The plant has thick, fleshy leaves that help it retain moisture in its natural habitat. It thrives in well-drained soil and requires indirect sunlight to flourish. Afraegle asso is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and relatively easy care requirements.
